Text:
Thank you! One sound track is mono, one is DTS stereo. Plays well in stereo with the VLC player, free download here:
http://www.videolan.org/vlc/
If your standalone player cannot handle DTS and you want stereo sound, you should convert the video before burning, for example with ConvertX to DVD. It converts the DTS track to AC3 stereo.

Compiled subtitles for the ZenBud version which was recompiled from this larger version... let me know if they don't correctly synch with this one :)

http://subscene.com/english/Farewell-LAffaire-Farewell/subtitle-455693.aspx
